raw akas.title: Devious Maids - Panni sporchi a Beverly Hills

akas: Devious Maids - Panni sporchi a Beverly Hills Italy
Nhung Co Hau Ranh Ma Vietnam
akas from release info: Devious Maids - Panni sporchi a Beverly Hills Italy
Nhung Co Hau Ranh Ma Vietnam

1.title: Once More Unto the Bleach
1.plot: People's lives change forever following the explosion at the Powell mansion.

2.title: Another One Wipes the Dust
2.plot: Rosie finds herself entangled in the aftermath of the latest murder, while Marisol makes a shocking discovery about Genevieve. Elsewhere, Daniela begins to display a wild streak, and a discovery makes Zoila uneasy.

3.title: War and Grease
3.plot: Genevieve's war on Marisol is taken to new heights. Carmen attempts to be "friends" with Daniela, but struggles when Dani's behavior spirals out of control. Zoila's friendship with Frances continues to build. Adrian cuts off Evelyn's funding, throwing a wrench into her plans to divorce him. Meanwhile, Rosie and Jesse have a new visitor to deal with.

4.title: Sweeping with the Enemy
4.plot: Marisol deals with a new roommate, while an unexpected visitor impacts Daniela and Carmen's relationship. Zoila goes on a blind date, and Genevieve makes a new friend.

5.title: A Time To Spill
5.plot: Rosie's efforts to prove Spence's innocence put her at risk, while Peter invites Marisol to an important gala. Zoila tries to make Kyle jealous, and Genevieve and Fabian's relationship takes an unexpected turn.

6.title: The Maid Who Knew Too Much
6.plot: Evelyn steps out into the dating world; Carmen goes on an audition for Danni; Kyle has to make a tough decision in regards to his mother and Zoila; Marisol has troubles with her new director; Peri's death is investigated by Genevieve and Rosie.

7.title: Blood, Sweat and Smears
7.plot: Rosie uncovers one of Peri's secrets. Evelyn tricks Carmen, while Marisol struggles with Peter's absence. Genevieve schemes to get Zoila's attention, and Carmen finds herself in a new relationship.

8.title: I Saw the Shine
8.plot: Carmen finds herself caught in the middle; Genevieve meddles in Marisol's life; a confession leads Rosie one step closer to finding Peri's real killer; Zoila and Kyle receive unpleasant surprises.

9.title: Much Ado About Buffing
9.plot: Marisol learns a secret from Genevieve's past; Zoila struggles to balance her love life and her demanding new boss; Danni seems to warm up to Carmen; Spence helps Rosie when Miguel begins acting out.

10.title: Grime and Punishment
10.plot: Zoila makes a discovery that helps Rosie get to the truth about Peri's murder; Carmen and Danni find themselves in a dangerous situation; Genevieve makes a new friend; Marisol tries to get closure with Peter; Adrian plans to share big news.

1.title: Pilot
1.plot: The women turn to one another for support when their friend and fellow maid Flora is brutally murdered.

2.title: Setting the Table
2.plot: Zoila is irritated by Valentina's attempts to get closer to Remi.

3.title: Wiping Away the Past
3.plot: Michael's ex-wife, Olivia, drops a bomb about Taylor's past.

4.title: Making Your Bed
4.plot: The arrival of Genvieve's brother, Henri, complicates matters for Zoila.

5.title: Taking Out the Trash
5.plot: A visitor from Carmen's past appears at Alejandro's house.

6.title: Walking the Dog
6.plot: Zoila's job is jeopardized when Genevieve has financial troubles.

7.title: Taking a Message
7.plot: A former student recognizes Marisol in front of Rosie.

8.title: Minding the Baby
8.plot: Genevieve lies to her new boyfriend about her age, much to Zoila's dismay.

9.title: Scrambling the Eggs
9.plot: Evelyn blackmails Rosie to get more time with baby Tucker.

10.title: Hanging the Drapes
10.plot: Valentina worries about Remi's return from rehab.

11.title: Cleaning Out the Closet
11.plot: Peri gets in an accident and Rosie gets angry. Marisol finds out if a suspect is valid but rouses questions. Carmen and Alejandro differ over his romance. Genvieve rekindles a flame but Zoila tests his fidelity.

12.title: Getting Out the Blood
12.plot: Marisol digs deeper into Flora's murder; Peri seeks Rosie's forgiveness.

13.title: Totally Clean
13.plot: The mystery surrounding Flora's death comes to a head.

1.title: An Ideal Husband
1.plot: Marisol gets caught up in a new romance. Zoila finds out Valentina has returned from Africa. Peri tries to drive a wedge between Spence and Rosie. Carmen and Alejandro keep up appearances. Adrian and Evelyn hire a handsome new bodyguard.

2.title: The Dark at the Top of the Stairs
2.plot: One of Alejandro's old flames threatens Carmen as she goes to great lengths to save her job. Zoila ignores issues at home when she helps Valentina out with her job. Rosie starts working for a new dysfunctional family. Marisol tries making up with Opal. Peri is aware of the issues in her marriage so threatens Spence to make him stay. Adrian fails to protect Evelyn but copes well with a home invasion.

3.title: Dangerous Liaisons
3.plot: Marisol discovers some secrets about Nicholas and Opal. Rosie takes Kenneth to a specialist. Carmen needs to prepare herself for a performance. Genevieve invites Zoila to a luncheon. Evelyn is suspicious about Adrian's behavior.

4.title: Crimes of the Heart
4.plot: Marisol grows suspicious of her fiancé. Genevieve asks Zoila to bring a date to a family event. Evelyn hatches a plan to drive Adrian out of the house. Carmen's new job creates a conflict. Ethan grows closer to Valentina.

5.title: The Bad Seed
5.plot: Nicholas grows jealous of Marisol's friendship with the book editor. Lussinda crosses the line with Rosie. A visitor creates problems for Carmen. And Tony makes a decision.

6.title: Private Lives
6.plot: Marisol discovers more secrets regarding Opal. Rosie tries to help Lucinda. Carmen prepares for a new performance. Genevieve meddles in Valentina and Ethan's relationship.

7.title: Betrayal
7.plot: Marisol and Nicholas come to a decision about Opal's employment. Reggie is jealous of Rosie's history. Carmen tries to end things with Ty. Zoila and Jasper's relationship progresses. Remi tries to make up with Valentina.

8.title: Night, Mother
8.plot: Marisol is surprised by a question from Nicholas. Opal asks Ethan for help. Genevieve invites Zoila and Javier for dinner. Evelyn and Adrian try to outsmart each other. Ty misbehaves. Lucinda argues with Rosie.

9.title: The Visit
9.plot: Reggie moves forward with his plans. Genevieve is surprised when her estranged mother arrives. Marisol deals with a new hire at the Deering mansion. Ty's obsession with Carmen takes a violent turn. Adrian grows suspicious of Tony.

10.title: Long Day's Journey Into Night
10.plot: Nicholas reveals a shocking secret while in a pill-induced haze. Rosie wants to save Kenneth. Zoila forces Genevieve to face her mother. Valentina asks Remi to help Ethan; Spence gets some bad news.

11.title: You Can't Take It with You
11.plot: Marisol confronts Opal about Nicholas' accident. Zoila and Pablo work together to help Valentina. Rosie continues to investigate Reggie. Spence's drinking start to have an impact on his job. Adrian learns the truth about Tony.

12.title: Proof
12.plot: Marisol tries to find out the truth about Nick's past. Zoila struggles with her feelings for Javier and Pablo. Carmen babysits Spence's son. Rosie recruits Lucinda and Didi's help to rescue Kenneth. Valentina talks to the police about Ethan.

13.title: Look Back in Anger
13.plot: Nick admits his secret to Marisol. Carmen meets a handsome stranger. Zoila receives some shocking news. Valentina is offered an opportunity. Spence and Rosie decide to get married.

1.title: Awakenings
1.plot: Lives are changed forever following the shooting at Rosie and Spence's wedding. A familiar couple returns to Beverly Hills with their new, mysterious daughter.

2.title: From Here to Eternity
2.plot: Zoila and Valentina face a serious decision about their future. Meanwhile, Marisol begins a new business venture, and Carmen insists on being her first client; Blanca struggles with her new employer and discovers a disturbing secret; and an unexpected visitor arrives in Beverly Hills.

3.title: The Awful Truth
3.plot: Everyone is hiding something and the awful truth starts coming out. While two secrets are confessed and one attempting cover-up reveals itself, we still don't know what the Stappord's are hiding from each other and about their newest family addition. Carmen actually makes herself useful and new maid Jesse seems suspicious.

4.title: Since You Went Away
4.plot: Rosie juggles having Ernesto back in her life. Genevieve makes a heartfelt offer to Zoila. When Jesse makes an unexpected discovery, he seeks out Marisol to help. Carmen finds a clever way to make Sebastien jealous. Michael becomes suspicious of Taylor.

5.title: The Talk of the Town
5.plot: Zoila discovers a secret from Genevieve's past; Rosie is torn between Ernesto and Spence; Marisol tries to fight her attraction towards Jesse; Carmen is outsmarted by Adrian; Taylor reaches her breaking point.

6.title: She Done Him Wrong
6.plot: Carmen unwillingly helps Adrian with his hobby which has dangerous consequences. Marisol worries over her relationship with Jesse. Zoila struggles with her feelings about having a new baby, while dealing with the arrival of her younger sister. Rosie continues to battle with her love for both of her husbands and makes a drastic decision. Evelyn has a new desire for the next chapter of her life.

7.title: The Turning Point
7.plot: Marisol struggles with Jesse being both her boyfriend and her employee. Zoila concocts a scheme to get her annoying sister to end her visit. Evelyn pursues her dream of adopting a child. Carmen's singing career finally gains traction. Rosie is suspicious of the Stappord's story about Katy.

8.title: Cries and Whispers
8.plot: Carmen gets creative when her new boss invites her on a double date. Zoila gets in the middle of Genevieve and her new boyfriend. Marisol discovers a new side of Jesse. Rosie and Ernesto disagree about her working at the Stappord home. Taylor struggles to deal with the aftermath of the police's latest discovery.

9.title: Bad Girl
9.plot: Evelyn has a big surprise awaiting Adrian upon his return from the hospital. Sebastien encourages Carmen to forge a relationship with Jacklyn. Zoila is shocked to discover a secret that Genevieve has been keeping from her. Marisol learns some surprising information about Jesse's past acquaintances. With Ernesto out of town, Rosie turns to Spence when she needs help parenting Miguel.

10.title: Whiplash
10.plot: Marisol questions the return of a familiar face to the neighborhood. Carmen's lies begin to catch up to her. Zoila tries to prove she is a better maid than Joy. Rosie's suspicions about Taylor lead her to a shocking discovery. Evelyn goes to the extreme in order to keep Deion.

11.title: Terms of Endearment
11.plot: Rosie makes a big decision after Spence starts asking questions about Ernesto's behavior. Zoila learns a disturbing truth about Dr. Neff and tries to warn Genevieve. Jesse clashes with Marisol over her suspicions about Olivia. Evelyn puts Carmen in charge of disciplining her foster son.

12.title: Suspicion
12.plot: Marisol begins to believe that Taylor is hiding something; Ernesto sets a plan into motion; Zoila has a hard time adapting to a change in her job; Adrian's past haunts him.

13.title: Anatomy of a Murder
13.plot: In the season finale, the maids risk their lives to unmask a killer.

locations: EUE/Screen Gems Studios Atlanta, 175 Lakewood Way, Atlanta, Georgia, USA
imdb.title: Devious Maids
plot: Four Latina maids with ambition and dreams of their own work for the rich and famous in Beverly Hills.::ABC
